author: Meera Syal
method: Heat the oil in a frying pan and add the squid and chillies. Fry for 1-2 minutes, until the squid turns opaque (no longer or it will become tough). Remove with slotted spoon and set aside. For the dressing, place all of the dressing ingredients into a bowl and mix well. To serve, place the squid mixture into a large bowl. Add the bananas, toasted sesame seeds and the dressing and stir well.
ingredients: 3 tbsp groundnut oil,  450g/1lb fresh squid, cleaned, cut into strips,  2-4 fresh chillies (green or red), chopped,  ½ orange, zest  and juice only,  ½ lemon, zest and juice only,  3 tbsp sunflower oil,  1 tsp white wine vinegar,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  3 bananas, peeled, chopped,  3 tbsp sesame seeds, toasted in a dry frying pan
